translations: adj.合成的（等于 synthetic）；人造的

sentences.sentence: Patches this complex put many other synths to shame!
sentences.translation: 这个复杂的修补程序提出许多其他合成羞愧！

sentences.sentence: At that site you can view not only your own synths, but the synths created by every other Photosynth user.
sentences.translation: 在这个网站上，你不仅可以看到自己制作的虚拟三维场景，还可以看到所有其他用户的作品。

sentences.sentence: A Macintosh version is in the works, but for now, you can't even view others' synths in the Mac operating system.
sentences.translation: 用于苹果电脑的版本还在研发之中，目前在苹果操作系统中你甚至无法看到其他人制作的synth。
